name: Purple Guy: The 2D Platformer
description:
Purple Guy: The 2D Platformer is a game where you play as a purple rectangle named 'Purple Guy'. Its optimal for speed running because of its built-in timer, and difficulty.

The game is pretty hard yes.

What makes it different from other 2D platformers? You play as a purple rectangle... Need I say more?

If you end up liking the game, consider sharing the fun to your friends and family.

If you want your high score to be added you have to send some proof of your time and give me a name to be assigned to that.

Highscores: 1# xX_gungler_Xx - 6:5:16
